'''Open-Air Workshop''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Interacting with the Open-Air Workshop opens the [[forging]] menu and allows the player to use it as a regular blacksmith's forge.

The blueprint for Open-Air Workshop is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|time = 16h
